title: "John Deere Debuts Autonomous Tractor: “One Giant Robot”"
excerpt: "The 8R tractor is a step towards solving labor and productivity challenges, but the move to autonomous farming is a five-stage journey. At a press conference during the CES 2022 show in January, agriculture equipment maker John Deere announced a major advancement for precision farming in the form of a self-driving autonomous tractor."
